Instruction: Preheat oil in a deep fryer to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Mix together flour, baking powder, sugar, and salt in a medium saucepan over low heat. Add eggs, ricotta cheese, and vanilla, stirring gently until well combined. The batter will be sticky.
Fry spoonfuls of the batter in the hot oil until golden brown, about 3 to 4 minutes. Drain on paper towels, then dust with powdered sugar before serving.
The actual nutritional content of the fried food may vary due to factors such as cooking time, temperature, ingredient properties, and the type of oil used.
